title: Positive Mind Techniques - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/24/20
itunes:title: Positive Mind Techniques - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/24/20
description:
George Noory and author Mitch Horowitz explore his research into positive energy and affirmations to stay upbeat when bad events happen in life, and how doing charitable things for other people will benefit yourself as well.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
